title: Candlestick
provenance: Howard Phillips, London; 1966 Phelps Warren, NY
description: Tall double-knopped shaft on domed, stepped base with thick square foot, bulbous nozzle, wide drip pan with up-turned edge cut with vertical flutes;removable brass drip pans; glass clear and heavy; shaft leans to one side.
name: Candlestick
